name: Block Hopper V_2
description:
Block Jumper v_1

HOW TO RUN:

- Extract the .zip and place the folder to your desired location.

- Click on Platformer.jar and the game should pop up.

This is an update to Platformer_v1. The old save was corrupted, so I had to remake a lot of features. Surprisingly, this helped me implement better mechanics and I feel that the game works a lot better overall now. 

This game is just a simple platformer. Use A and D to move, and W is to jump. Esc is to pause, which will bring up a small pause menu.  There are 30 levels you must get through in order to beat the game. (Note: If you have played v_1, you will notice some level redesigns).

Hope you enjoy it!
